revision.comment: Omega moved page [[Arcadyan ARV7519]] to [[Arcadyan ARV7519RW22]]
revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Arcadyan |model=ARV7519 |revision=RW22 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |is_manuf=Yes |manuf=Arcadyan |manuf_model=ARV7519 |manuf_rev=RW22 |availability= |type=wireless router,dsl modem,analog phone gateway |fcc_id= |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=15 |pwr_amp=1.66 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Lantiq |cpu1_model=PSB 80920;XWAY™ VRX288 (PSB 80920 EL V1.1); |cpu1_cspeed=500 |cpu1_cores= |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29GL256ELT2I-90Q |fla1_num= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM68C16CWVB-25H |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, EJTAG |serial=yes |wi1_chip1_brand=Lantiq |wi1_chip1_model=PSB 8231;XWAY™ WAVE300 (PSB 8231 EL V1.1); |wi1_chip2_brand=Lantiq |wi1_chip2_model=PSB 8304;XWAY™ WAVE300 (PSB 8304 V1.1); |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Lantiq |eth_chip2_model=PEF 7071V |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags=ADSL2+, VDSL2+ |stock_boot=BRN-Boot |stock_os=VxWorks |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=ARV7519XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^ARV7519[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=74:31:70 |oui_eth=74:31:70 }} '''Wireless ADSL Gateway VR9''' "P/N: 141751920003J R01" is silkscreened on the board in the images provided here. :The default SSID appears to be '''ARV7519XXXXXX''' where '''XXXXXX''' :is the last three octets of the wireless interface MAC address. [http://www.pcwintech.com/screenshots-arcadyan-arv7519-arcadyan-firmware Router screenshots on PcWinTech] [[Orange Livebox 2.1]] :[http://www.redeszone.net/routers/nuevo-router-multimedia-livebox-analisis-del-nuevo-router-de-orange-con-wi-fi-n-a-300mbps/ Review ''Orange Livebox'' on '''RedesZone'''] (SP) *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=39074 ''Arcadyan ARV7519'' on '''OpenWrt''' forums] *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/arcadyan/vgv7519 ''Astoria VGV7519'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] 
The router is called Livebox 2.1 and manufactured by Astoria. 
Model: ARV7519RW22-A-LT.
Hardware:
- CPU: PSB 80920 (VRX288)
- Flash: MXIC MX29Gl256ELT2I 32 MB
- RAM: Etrontech EM68C16CWVB (64Mx16 DDR2) up to 400MHz
- ADSL/VDSL: Lantiq PSB 80208V VR9
- Wireless: Lantiq PSB 8231 + PSB 8304 (maybe XWAY 300)
- VoIP: Lantiq PEF 42068
- Gigabit switch: Lantiq PEF 7071V (four 10/100 ports
  integrated in SoC and one 10/100/1000 throught RGMII)
The firmware i guess is based in VxWorks and BRN-Boot as bootloader

Architecture:	MIPS 34Kc
Vendor:		Lantiq
Bootloader:	BRNBoot
System-On-Chip:	VRX288 V1.1 (PSB 80920 EL)
CPU/Speed	500MHz
Flash-Chip:	EN29LV640AB-90TIP
Flash size:	16 MB (2x 8 MB)
RAM:		64 MB (EM68B16CWQD-25H)
WAN:		1x RJ45
Modem:		Infineon/Lantiq XWAY VRX208
Wireless:	Ralink RT5362F (TPHR059609, 1222STA1) 2.4GHz 802.11bgn
Ethernet:	3x Lantiq PEF 7071V, internal configurable (Infineon)
Internet:	ADSL2+
Phone:		Lantiq XWAY SLIC120 (PEF 42068 V V1.2), 3x FXS 
                (TAE ports which provide POTS via a SIP gateway)
USB:		Yes 2x USB 2.0
Serial:		Yes
JTAG:		Yes (EJTAG 14p)
